column5: Hi all.  I would really like to try some spring crappie fishing with my son (he is 6).  Not looking for anyones honey hole, just a body of water with the best chance of finding some.  PM's welcome.  I have a boat.  Thanks in advance.
Go to bradford, lots of crappies there. Parking is free and so is the ramp. Unless you want to fish a long shore with 50-100ppl Hope this helps you. flip
